::Battera::

She smiled, "OK, I'll join you out side."  She turned and looked down 
the hallway nervousely.  SHe was hoping not to run into that 
wolverine.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow <twb176@y...> wrote:
> ::WindRider::
> "Hey listen" he said to Battera, "I think I'm going to
> go outside and get some fresh air, and see what I can
> see. You can join me if you like." He smiled at her,
> hoping she would accept.
